content: दूतिका, --दूती {@--1@} A female messenger, a confidante. {@--2@} A go-between, procuress. {@--3@} A gossiping or mischief-making woman. ({%<ab>N. B.</ab>%} The ती of दूती is sometimes shortened; see <ls>R. 18. 53</ls>, <ls n="R.">19. 18</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 16</ls> and <ls>Malli.</ls> thereon).
